name: AnotherQuizzGame
description:
AnotherQuizzGame or "AQG" is a indie game, the main purpose
is to answer multiple quizzes created or not by the community!

So find many quizzes around many diverse and varied topics
of the Culture of Videogames, cinema or a questionnaire on charcuterie !


You will have understood, here it is YOU ARE the creator!
If you have a VorTeXDev account and log in from the game,
you will have at your disposal the mode "Editor" which will allow you to create your own quiz
and share them FOR FREE worldwide !

The quizzes have many parameters and are fully customizable!
You will find :
• Set lifes
• Defind the question type :
- True or False
- Multiple Answer Questions
- Text Answer
• Defind the number of question

and more !


Here, everything is important, every animation, every interface, every music...
EVERYTHING MUST SHINE! EVERYTHING MUST BE BEAUTIFUL!
